title: DocumentDB Lambda Stream
description: Create a DocumentDB stream that publishes events to EventBridge

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to use AWS Lambda with DocumentDB to capture changes that occur on data collections and send events to EventBridge. This pattern is leveraging the native integration between the following services: DocumentDB Stream -> Lambda -> EventBridge.
This pattern deploys one EventBridge bus and one Lambda function.

bullets.text: Tutorial: Using AWS Lambda with Amazon DocumentDB Streams

text: See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.
